p: To the Keeper of the common Jail of the County of St Louis Greeting

You are hereby commanded to re- ceive the body of the above named Adam Riley into your common jail, and detain him in custody until he is called for by his master and all reasonable charges paid or until he be therein discharged in due cause of Law
Given under my hand this 4th day of July 1853
The State Court vs Adam Riley a Runaway Slave
